name: Pokemon Topaz
summary: This is a clone (not a port) of the now famous Pokemon Yellow game. It came second at the 2011 edition of the zContest. You can capture up to 44 Pokemons, fight against other trainers and even trade Pokemons with your friends (with the external program by Zero44) ! Become the best trainer of all times and defeat the Elite Four.
info:
• 中文名: 宝可梦 黄宝石
  • 平台: TI Z80
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游戏引擎: Axe Parser
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2011年8月8日
  • 官方网站: http://www.omnimaga.org/ti-z80-calculator-projects/pokemon-topaze-%28axe%29/
